description: Atticus reached out to us a few weeks ago and said he was really excited to be a part of SeanCody, so we decided we would throw him in the deep end. Once he got here, Atticus walked around the studio in awe. “I’ve been a fan of the site pretty much my whole life, so this is like a dream come true.” He said with a huge smile on his face. Atticus also admitted that he had a bit of a crush on Rowan. “What is about him that turns you on?” “I don't know. I think we have the same sense of humor and personality. Also, I think he's really cute.” Since Atticus was brand new, Rowan actually took him under his wing and they hung out before the shoot. “What did you guys do?” I had to ask Atticus got all bashful. “It was kinda like a date. We went to the movies and out to grab some food.” Rowan started to laugh. “I guess it was a date when you say it like that!” Once they got to fucking you could tell the Atticus was really getting into it. I pulled him aside to check in with him. He was smiling from ear to ear. “This is the best day of my life!”
title: Newcomer Atticus & Rowan: Bareback
